main.title: SBTCVM Ternary Calculator help
main.text: SBTCVM's Ternary calculator provides a specialized tool for common Ternary Calculations.
main.title: Input A:
main.text: Input A is the primary input.
main.title: Input B:
main.text: Input A is the primary input.
main.title: Inputs Explained:
main.text:
click on the decimal portion (D)to enter a decimal integer. Click on the balanced ternary portion (T) to enter a balanced ternary integer. cross conversion is preformed.
Note: if you want the result (RES) in one of the inputs, the "RES>A" and "RES>B" buttons can be used.
main.title: Result and Status area:
main.text: The result readouts look similar to the inputs, but you will see an addition part labeled "s." This is the Status readout. This will generally show information on Errors and results of calculations.
main.title: Buttons Explained:
main.text: "add": add A and B "sub": subtract A and B "div": divide A by B "mul": multiply A by B "copy A>B": Copy A to B "invert A": Invert A "tritwise" (replace + with - and vice versa) "mpi": Calculate The Max positive integer of an integer (Decimal A) trits long. "mcv": Calculate The Max combinations value of an integer (Decimal A) trits long. "res>A": Copy Result to A (This is NOT done automatically!) "res>B": Copy Result to B (This is NOT done automatically!) "copy B>A": Copy B to A "invert B": Invert B "tritwise" (replace + with - and vice versa) "mni": Calculate The Max Negative integer of an integer (Decimal A) trits long. "swap": Swap A with B "help": SBTCVM help "quit": quit the calculator.
